adHeader: Expert Mechanic (All Makes, Models, and Hybrids)
adDetails: I have been working on cars and motorcycles for over 15 years. I grew up in my fathers mechanic shop and have worked on all makes and models. I have also worked as a dealership mechanic for GMC for over 5 years. My knowledge and experience cannot be matched. I work on cars, trucks, vans, motorhomes, motorcycles, generators. If it has an engine, I can fix it. I also work on Hybrids and luxury cars. I can do custom work and I work on classic cars as well. My services are mobile. I have all kinds of tools, both specialty and common, that allow me to work on a wide range of vehicles. My hourly rate is $45 an hour. I can also agree on a flat rate If there is a lot of work to be done. My name is Omar, and I can work with you to get your car back on the road for much less $$$ than any competitor. Email me with your information and I will respond with a quote that will put a smile on our face.
